title: Getting the Old War Office presentable was a war the second time around too
description: “We worked with most international brands over Zoom,” Shalini Hinduja recollects, calling the experience “a steep learning curve”. The property, with 120 rooms and 85 private residences, tied up with iconic brands such as Raffles and Guerlain Spa to name a few. It is their London debut too, making the collaborations for all sides a win-win situation.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
